name: Elementwise ax + by + Δ
description: Returns linear combination ax+by+Δ or (if the flag is set) its absolute value |ax+by+Δ|. Second argument y is optional: if it is skipped, it is supposed to be zero.

in_ports.name: y
in_ports.hint: [Optional] Ignored if skipped (function returns ax + Δ)

controls.name: absoluteValue
controls.caption: Absolute value
controls.description: If set, this function returns absolute value |ax + by + Δ| instead of usual result.

controls.caption: First X column
controls.description: First index of number in the blocks of the array X
controls.name: indexInBlockX

controls.caption: First Y column
controls.description: First index of number in the blocks of the array Y
controls.name: indexInBlockY

controls.caption: Number of processed columns
controls.description: Length of processed part in each block of both arrays; if 0, all arrays are processed and indexes above are ignored
controls.name: lengthInBlock

controls.caption: Replace processed columns
